com.htsmart.wristband.dfu

Class DfuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.htsmart.wristband.dfu.DfuManager

  • public class DfuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Use for DFU operation.The DFU procedure is as followsï¼š

    1.Request Enter OTA.
    If you have connected to the wristband, request the wristband enter OTA mode with IDevicePerformer.cmd_requestEnterOTA() method.
    You don't need to call in other places yourself, DfuManager will help you do this work.
    If there is not a connected wristband, go to the next step.
    2.Search OTA Device.
    If wristband enter OTA mode success, the name and address of the wristband will change. DfuManager will search bluetooth device by deviceName which your pass in DfuManager(Context, String)
    3.Send OTA Packet.
    If find a OTA device, DfuManager will start send OTA data packet.
    4.The progress of send OTA data packet. Form 0 to 100.
    5.DFU Success

    You need to follow the steps below:

    1.Get DfuManager instance with DfuManager(Context) or DfuManager(Context, String).
    2.Call init() on activity onCreate() method.
    3.Set a callback with setDfuCallback(DfuCallback).
    4.Call startDfu(String) method start dfu process.
    Your can cancel the dfu process with cancelDfu() method. But it may be failed, because if dfu process in sending OTA data packet, it can't be canceled.
    5.Call destroy() on activity onDestroy() method.
